src_original: Mit_8.3 aṣṭau dharmā abhijñeyāḥ / aṣṭau lokadharmāḥ / katame ’ṣṭau / lābho ’lābho yaśo yaśo nindā praśaṁsā sukhaṁ duḥkham /
tgt_original: 利、衰、毀、譽、稱、譏、苦、樂，是名世八法。 何謂八非聖語？

src_original: Mit_8.4 aṣṭau dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ / aṣṭau mithyāṅgāni / tadyathā mithyādṛṣṭir mithyāsaṁkalpo mithyāvāg mithyākarmānto mithyājīvo mithyavyāyāmo mithyāsmṛtir mithyāsamādhiḥ /
tgt_original: 若不見言見、見言不見、不聞言聞、聞言不聞、不覺言覺、覺言不覺、不識言識、識言不識，是名八非聖語。

src_original: Mit_8.5 aṣṭau dharmā hānabhāgīyāḥ / aṣṭau kausīdyavastūni /
tgt_original: 何謂八懈怠事？

src_original: Mit_8.5.1.a iha bhikṣur grāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vopaniśṛtya viharati / sa tatra pūrvāhne nivasya pātracīvaram ādāya tam eva grāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya praviśati / ato ’haṁ lapsyāmi praṇītaṁ praṇītaṁ khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ yāvadāptam / na balavān me kāyaḥ karmaṇy aprahāṇakṣamaḥ / yannv ahaṁ pratiyaty eva nipatyeyam /
tgt_original: 若有懈怠比丘，如是思惟： 我今日入聚落乞食已，我得麁細食不充足，以不足故令我羸瘦，不樂經行坐禪，我欲眠臥。

src_original: Mit_8.5.1.c sa pratiyaty eva nipatyati / na vyāyatate ’prāptasya prātaye ’nadhigatasyādhigamāyāsākṣīkṛtasya sākṣīkriyāyai / idaṁ prathamaṁ kausīdyavastu /
tgt_original: 懈怠比丘即便眠臥，不能勤進為未得欲得、未解欲解、未證欲證，是名初懈怠事。

src_original: Mit_8.5.2.a punar aparaṁ bhikṣur grāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vopaniśṛtya viharati / sa tatra pūrvāhne nivasya
tgt_original: 復次比丘如是思惟：

src_original: pātracīvaram ādāya tam eva grāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya praviśati / ato ’haṁ na lapsyāmi praṇītaṁ khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ yāvadāptaṁ tasyaivaṁ bhavati / Mit_8.5.2.b na labdhvā ca praṇītaṁ khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ yāvadāptaṁ tasyaivaṁ bhavati / na labdhaṁ yannvahaṁ pratiyaty eva nipatyeyam /
tgt_original: 我今日入聚落中乞食，得麁細食充足，身體重妨如肉囊盛錢，不樂經行坐禪，我欲眠臥。

src_original: Mit_8.5.6 … punar aparaṁ bhikṣur divā mārgam āgato bhavati / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / mayā khalu divā mārgam āgato na me śaktaṁ mārgañ ca gantuṁ śāstuś ca śāsane yogam āpattum / yannv ahaṁ pūrvavat / idaṁ ṣaṣṭhaṁ kausīdyavastu / Mit_8.5.7 punar aparaṁ bhikṣur ābādhiko bhavati duḥkhito bāḍhaglānaḥ / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / aham etarhy ābādhiko duḥkhito bāḍhaglānaḥ / sthānam etad vidyati yad … … yannv ahaṁ pūrvavat / idam saptamaṁ kausīdyavastu
tgt_original: 懈怠比丘即便眠臥，不能勤進為未得欲得、未解欲解、未證欲證，此謂第二懈怠事。

src_original: Mit_8.5.8 punar aparaṁ bhikṣur aciravyutthito bhavati / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / aham etarhy aciravyutthitaḥ / sthānam etad vidyate yad …
tgt_original: 復次懈怠比丘，如是思惟：

src_original: …akāle maraṇaṁ syāt kālakriyā / yannv ahaṁ pūrvavat / idam aṣṭamaṁ kausīdyavastu / Mit_8.6 aṣṭau dharmā viśeṣabhāgīyāḥ / aṣṭau vīryāraṁbhavastūni / katamāny aṣṭa / Mit_8.6.1.a iha bhikṣur grāmaṁ vānigamaṁ vopaniśṛtya viharati / sa tatra pūrvāhne nivasya pātracīvaraṁ khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ yāvadāptaṁ tasyaivaṁ bhavati / Mit_8.6.1.b labdhvā ca praṇītaṁ khādavīyabhojanīyaṁ yāvadāptaṁ tasyaivaṁ bhavati / labdhaṁ mayā
tgt_original: 我今日有作務疲懈，不樂經行坐禪，我欲眠臥。

src_original: Mit_8.6.1.c sa pratiyaty eva vyāyatate ’prāptasya prāptaye ’nadhigatsyādhigamāyā sākṣīkṛtasya sākṣīkriyāyai / idaṁ prathamaṁ vīryāraṁbhavastu /
tgt_original: 懈怠比丘即便眠臥，不能勤進為未得欲得、未解欲解、未證欲證，此謂第三懈怠事。

src_original: Mit_8.6.2.a punar aparaṁ bhikṣur grāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vopaniśṛtya viharati / sa tatra pūrvāhne nivasya
tgt_original: 復次懈怠比丘，如是思惟：

src_original: pātracīvaram ādāya tam eva grāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya praviśati / ato ’ham na lapsyāmi praṇītaṁ khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ yāvadāptaṁ tasyaivaṁ bhavati /
tgt_original: 我明日當作務、身當疲懈，便不樂經行坐禪，我今豫眠臥。

src_original: mayā praṇītaṁ khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ yāvadāptaṁ / balavān me kāyaḥ / karmaṇi prahāṇakṣamaḥ /
tgt_original: 我今日行來，身體疲極，不樂經行坐禪，我欲眠臥。

src_original: yannv ahaṁ pratiyaty eva vyāyateyam / Mit_8.6.2.c sa pratiyaty eva vyāyatate ’prāptasya prāptaye ’nadhigatasyādhigamāyāsākṣīkṛtaasya sākṣīkriyāyai / idaṁ dvitīyaṁ vīryāraṁbhavastu /
tgt_original: 懈怠比丘即便眠臥，不能勤進為未得欲得、未解欲解、未證欲證，此謂第五懈怠事。

src_original: Mit_8.6.3.a punar aparaṁ bhikṣuṇā śvaḥ karma kartavyaṁ bhavati / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / mayā khalu
tgt_original: 復次懈怠比丘，如是思惟：

src_original: śvaḥ karma kartavyam / na śakyaṁ mayā karma ca kartuṁ śāstuś ca śāsane yogam āpattum /
tgt_original: 我明日當行、身必疲極，便不樂經行坐禪，我欲眠臥。

src_original: Mit_8.6.4.a punar aparaṁ bhikṣuṇā divā karma kṛtaṁ bhavati / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / mayā khalu divā
tgt_original: 復次懈怠比丘，如是思惟：

src_original: karma kṛtam / na me śaktaṁ karma ca kartuṁ śāstuś ca śāsane yogam āpattum / yannv
tgt_original: 我今患苦，不樂經行坐禪，我欲眠臥。

src_original: ahaṁ pratiyaty eva vyāyateyam / Mit_8.6.4.b sa pratiyaty eva vyāyatate / khaṇḍasya vā cchidrasya vā paripūraṇārtham / vyāyatate ’prāptasya prāptaye ’nadhigatasyādhigamāyāsākṣīṛtasya sākṣīkriyāyai / idaṁ caturthaṁ vīryāraṁbhavastu /
tgt_original: 懈怠比丘即便眠臥，不能勤進為未得欲得、未解欲解、未證欲證，此謂第七懈怠事。

src_original: Mit_8.6.5.a punar aparaṁ bhikṣuṇā śvo mārgo gantavyo bhavati / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / mayā khalu
tgt_original: 復次懈怠比丘，如是思惟： 我患差未久、我身羸弱，不樂經行坐禪，我欲眠臥。

src_original: Mit_5.9.2.a punar iha bhikṣor naiva śāstā vā dharmāñ deśayaty anyatamānyatamo vā vijño gurusthānīyaḥ Mit_5.9.2.b yathā yathā sa yathā śrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṁ karoti /
tgt_original: 復次比丘，非世尊非師非慧梵淨行者說時，如先所聞法廣讀誦通利。

src_original: karoty api ca sa yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa pareṣāṁ saṁprakāśayati Mit_5.9.3.b yathā yathā sa yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa pareṣāṁ saṁprakāśayati
tgt_original: 如比丘隨彼所聞法通利、廣為他說，受法受義。

src_original: tathā tathā sa teṣu dharmeṣv arthapratisaṁvedī bhavati dharmapratisaṁvedī ca / tasyārthapratisaṁvedino
tgt_original: 比丘受法受義已生悅，悅已生喜，喜已得身除，身除已受樂，受樂已心定，心定已如實知見。

src_original: Mit_5.9.4.a punar aparaṁ nāpy asya śāstā dharmān deśayaty anyatamānyatamo vā vijño gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacāri nāpi yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṁ karoti nāpi yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa pareṣaṁ saṁprakāśyaty api
tgt_original: 復次如比丘，非世尊非師非慧梵淨行者說時，非先所聞法廣讀誦通利時，非先所聞法通利廣、為他分別時，如比丘先所聞法通利、自心分別。

src_original: ca yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān ekākī rohagataś cintayati tulayaty upaparīkṣate
tgt_original: 如比丘隨所聞法通利、自心分別，受法受義。

src_original: Mit_5.9.4.b yathā yathā khalu yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān ekākī rohagataś cintayati tulayati saṁparīkṣate tathā tathā sa teṣu dharmeṣv arthapratisaṁvedī bhavati dharmapratisaṁvedī ca / tasyārthapratisaṁvedino dharmapratisaṁvedina utpadyate prāmodyaṁ pūrvavad idaṁ caturthaṁ vimuktyāyatanam /
tgt_original: 比丘受法受義已生悅，悅已生喜，喜已得身除，身除已受樂，受樂已心定，心定已如實知見。 比丘如是不放逸勤念正智寂靜行，心未解脫得解脫、諸漏未盡得漏盡、未得無上安隱得安隱，是名第四解脫處。

src_original: Mit_5.9.5.a punar aparaṁ nāpy asya śāstā dharmān deśayati nāpy anyatamānyatamo vijño gurustānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī nāpi yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṁ karoti nāpi yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa pareṣāṁ saṁprakāśayati nāpi yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān ekākī rahogataś cintayati tulayaty upaparīkṣate ’ pi ca khalv asya bhikṣor anyataraṁ samādhinimittaṁ bhavati sugṛhītaṁ sumanasikṛtaṁ
tgt_original: 復次比丘，非世尊非師非慧梵淨行者說時，非先所聞法廣讀誦通利時，非先所聞法通利廣、為他分別時，非先所聞法通利、自心分別時，如比丘善取定相、善思惟、善解射。

src_original: supradhāritaṁ supratividdhaṁ / Mit_5.9.5.b yathā yathā khalv asya bhikṣor anyataraṁ samādhinimittaṁ bhavati sugṛhītaṁ sumanasikṛtaṁ supradhāritaṁ supratividdhaṁ tathā tathā sa teṣu dharmeṣv arthapratisaṁvedī bhavati
tgt_original: 比丘善取定想、善思惟、善解射已，受法受義。

src_original: dharmapratisaṁvedī ca / Mit_5.9.5.c tasyārthapratisaṁvedino dharmapratisaṁvedina utpadyate prāmodyaṁ pramudityasya prītir
tgt_original: 受法受義已生悅，悅已生喜，喜已得身除，身除已受樂，受樂已心定，心定已如實知見。

src_original: aṣṭau te dharmapratyayāḥ / Mit_8.2 aṣṭau dharmā bhāvayitavyāḥ / āryo ’ṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ / tadyathā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṁkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhir evāṣṭamaḥ /
tgt_original: 何謂世間八法？
